text: Thamer Chaim (born 1 June 1945) is a Brazilian weightlifter. He competed in the men's super heavyweight event at the 1972 Summer Olympics.Thamer Chaim He was born in São Paulo. == References == Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian weightlifters Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo
title: Thamer Chaim
